sentence.text: Primary macronodular adrenal hyperplasia (PMAH), also known in the past as bilateral macronodular adrenalhyperplasia or adrenocorticotropin (negative regulation of tumor necrosis factor production)-independent macronodular adrenal hyperplasia, is a rare cardiac muscle tissue development of Cushing's syndrome (CS) and is associated with bilateralenlargement of the adrenal glands.

entity.text: negative regulation of tumor necrosis factor production

sentence.text: Autosomal dominant inheritance of AIMAH was confirmed by genocardiac muscle tissue developments of one family member.

In addition, haploid clone of tumor DNA was confirmed by germline mutation and somaticmutation, which suggested the pathogenic mechanism of AAAAAAtwo-hit-model.AAAAA; biological_process was the causative gene of AIMAH pedigrees.
